ch.aplu.jgamegrid
Class ToolBarSeparator

java.lang.Object
  ch.aplu.jgamegrid.Actor
      ch.aplu.jgamegrid.ToolBarItem
          ch.aplu.jgamegrid.ToolBarSeparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GGActorCollisionListener, GGBorderListener, GGTileCollisionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ToolBarSeparator
extends ToolBarItem

A class to represent actors used for tool bar items. All sprites images in a tool bar should have the same height.

Constructor Detail

ToolBarSeparator

public ToolBarSeparator(int width,
                        int height,
                        java.awt.Color color)
Creates a tool bar item whose image is a rectangle with given width and height filled with given color. If color = null, the rectangle is transparent.

Parameters:
width - the width in pixel
height - the height in pixel
color - the fill color
